message: Overhaul to notifications. Also graphs will 'dim' if the data is out-of-date or invalid.
Amplified Pressure graph slightly to accommodate reactions from Penelope.
Now rendering graphs using D3.js and SVGs. This is much faster on mobile devices. The source data is now coming from yr.no with a 12h prediction.
Created a merged graph extending the recorded data with the 12 hour prediction.
Show pressure and wind, past and future graphs.
